DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a clinical protocol to detoxify patients from opiates to naltrexone using buprenorphine and to develop pilot data for a grant application for a controlled study of the efficacy of the new clinical protocol for outpatients.
DOC.brief_title: Rapid Opiate Detoxification and Naltrexone Induction Using Buprenorphine - 2
DOC.criteria: Males/Females, ages 2150. Opiate dependence according to DSMIV criteria. Selfreported use within the last 30 days. Agreeable to conditions of study and signed informed consent. psychiatric disorder that requires medication therapy. History of seizures. Pregnant and/or nursing women. Dependent on etoh or benzodiazepines or other sedativehypnotics. Acute hepatitis. Other medical conditions that deem participation to be unsafe.
